thread.title: Trump’s awkward handshake with Trudeau becomes instant meme
thread.title_full: Trump’s awkward handshake with Trudeau becomes instant meme

author: RT
title: Trump’s awkward handshake with Trudeau becomes instant meme
text:
Trump’s awkward handshake with Trudeau becomes instant meme  55 Get short URL Canadian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau (L) and U.S. President Donald Trump © Kevin Lamarque / Reuters An awkward moment that was caught on camera between US President Donald Trump and Canadian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau during their first face to face meeting in the White House has sent the internet into meltdown mode. 
READ MORE: Trump wants to 'tweak' outstanding trade relationship with Canada 
Adding to Trump’s steadily growing collection of awkward handshakes, the US president put out his hand to Trudeau only to be met with a bemused stare. 
While it was merely a split-second snap captured by a lucky photographer, and in fact Trudeau went on to happily shake Trump’s hand, the Twitterati couldn’t resist but point out all the possible thoughts that could have been running through the Canadian PM’s head. Trudeau's face is literally me when looking anything in the news since Jan 20th pic.twitter.com/BHCaiDIHLM
